name: Enervate
text: You can perform the secondary abilities of the puppeted player's strategy cards without spending command tokens; for "Leadership," you can perform the primary ability instead.

name: Siphon
text: When the puppeted player gains commodities, you gain an equal number of trade goods.

name: Seethe
text:
When this card is revealed, destroy all units on a non-home planet controlled by the puppeted player.
At the start of the status phase, destroy 1 of the puppeted player's infantry in any system.

name: Assail
text: Apply +1 to the results of each of your combat and unit ability rolls against the puppeted player.

name: Extract
text:
When this card is revealed, gain 1 non-faction technology owned by the puppeted player.
When the puppeted player gains a non-faction technology, you may spend 4 resources to gain that technology.
